eu_initiatives:
GAfPA remains focused on identifying policies that impact patient access to approved therapeutic treatments. 
 
GAfPA will follow and engage in activities related to DG SANTE, focused primarily on patient access policies and legislation. Contact and meetings with staff at the DG Health and Food Safety as well as the EU Parliament.
subsection: Non-governmental organisations, platforms and networks and similar
relevant_communication: GAfPA produces workshops, conferences and gatherings of stakeholders that are impacted by policy issues surrounding access to medicines.
goals__remit: GAfPA educates physicians and patients on health policy issues and developing education material and advocacy initiatives to promote informed policymaking.
